a.n: Trail Blazers/Spurs, 1999 Western Conference Finals - Game 2 - Popcast

p.k: Added pop up facts throughout the game in which Sean Elliott hit a corner 3-pointer with nine seconds left to give the Spurs an 86-85 victory against the Trail Blazers in Game 2 of the Western Conference finals. The Spurs had been down 18 points in the third quarter.
